com.iha.emulator.models

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.models.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Model of sensor holding information needed to emulate sensor's/actuator's behaviour.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

              Protocol protocol)
        Creates Sensor model with given connection status, id, name, battery,...
        Parameters:
        status - connection to adapter status
        id - sensor's ID
        name - sensor's name
        battery - sensor's battery value
        signal - sensor's signal value
        refreshTime - sensor's refresh time
        protocol - instance of class implementing Protocol
